narrative:
Applicant has completed all requirements and is ready to be relicensed as a class (cid:28)C(cid:29) exhibitor.  Applicant to mail
the correct license fee to the Eastern Regional Office at:
USDA-APHIS-AC
920 Main Campus Dr.

Please include your customer number 10947 on the check or credit card authorization.
The licensing process must be completed within 90 days of the first prelicense inspection  which occurred on 21
August 2014, or else the application will be cancelled and the application fee will be forfeit.
NO REGULATED ACTIVITY UNTIL USDA LICENSE IS RECEIVED
